p: The main compounds of C. dioscoridis oil were α-cadinol (10.7%), hexadecanoic acid (10.5%), 4,4-dimethyltetracyclo-(6,3,2,0)(2,5)0(1,8)tridecan-9-ol (6.1%), τ-cadinol (4.7%), hexanoic acid (4.6%), carvone (3.7%) and τ-muurolol (3.5%) and representing 43.8% of the oil (Table 3). p-Allylanisole (88%) and limonene (5.2%) constituted the major part of F. vulgare essential oil.
